DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate how long it takes for NNAL and cotinine, both specific markers of second hand tobacco smoke exposure to clear the human body.
DOC.brief_title: NNAL Clearance in Hair and Urine
DOC.criteria: Healthy caucasians and african americans 19 years of agae or above, how are ready to quit smoking Anyone who is not a caucasian or an africanamerican, below 19 years of age, and is currently taken prescription medication.
DOC.keyword: NNAL is a known lung carcinogen. So, we are studying an agent that can potentially cause lung cancer.
